title: Burning Bright: Billionaires in Disguise: Lizzy
description: Lizzy has broken her contract with Mannix and destroyed her growing relationship with Theo, but now Mannix is stalking her, trying to get her back. She wants time away to think, so she manages to get past the sports reporters stalking her at her dorm, where Georgie has received a text from Rae telling them to get on a plane to Paris.Lizzy flies away to Europe, believing that she will be safe from Mannix and gain some time to think about Theo, but when both men show up in the City of Light, she canâ€™t escape the danger that follows both of them.The thrilling conclusion to Billionaires in Disguise: Lizzy is a whirlwind of suspense, shocking revelations, and the healing power of love.
author: Blair Babylon
